name: SCP-087 (itch)
description:
This is a very short, unfinished horror experience based on the SCP-087 (http://www.scpwiki.com/scp-087). Made for the Haunted PS1 Game Jam. I started this veeeerrryyy late though, so this is only about a week or so of work.

Please play with headphones. There are no loud sudden jumpscares. Game ends when you run out of batteries. This is intended to just give you a few spooks. I hope you enjoy it for what it is.

[W A S D] - Movement

[MOUSE]  - Look

[TAB] or [ESCAPE] - Access inventory. Needed to change your flashlight batteries.
